features: LIGHT WEIGHT: This nutrient rich, light weight conditioner can be used every day with all SkiKai shampoos without weighing down hair. Providing manageble, tangle free hair with a healthy shine.
HYDRATE DRY & DAMAGED HAIR: Our Everyday Conditioner is wonderful for all hair types. Containing omega-6 fatty acid promoting scalp health.
POWER OF BORAGE: Borage Oil supplies the skin with GLA, gamma linolenic acid, a vital omega-6 fatty acid to keep the hair & scalp nourished.
MOISTURIZE & NOURISH: ShiKai's Borage Conditioner is formulated to nourish and detangle hair. Formulated to be gentle and effective. Phthalate, Sulfate, and Gluten Free.
CLEAN HAIR CARE: ShiKai products are plant-based, formulated by scientists from ingredients found in nature. ShiKai Products is family owned for over 50 years and manufactured in Sonoma County, CA.
body.description: ShiKai Signature Hair Care Everyday Conditioner, 12 oz, Pack of 2 - Contains borage oil for healthy, shiny and manageable hair. This nutrient-rich, light conditioner can be used every day with all ShiKai shampoos. It provides manageable, easy comb-out, and a healthy shine. It won’t weigh down hair, and can be used with all hair types. Our special ingredient is borage oil which contains an omega-6 fatty acid that promotes healthy scalp and provides nourishing hydration and shine to dry or damaged hair. Condition your hair with shikakai extract. This plant based hydrating conditioner is extremely gentle, and is rich in botanical ingredients for all hair types. - Plant based - Rich in botanical ingredients - Nutrient-rich, not heavy

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Chemistry & Nature In 1970, Dr. Dennis Sepp, an organic chemist, began exploring natural, ayurvedic ingredients for hair and skincare. Dr.Sepp knew that the natural world offered functional ingredients that were better and safer than conventional chemical ingredients. In his first study, he created a water-soluble extract from shikakai powder—ShiKai shampoo. Now, ShiKai manufactures more than 50 products, sold in premium markets all over the world. Innovation ShiKai products offer unique, plant-based solutions. Using ancient ingredients like shikakai and the modern technology of omega-6 oil, ShiKai has forged a new direction in both hair and skincare. Made with Pride We formulate our products based on scientific study and rigorous standards. We make our own botanical extracts and produce our products in our state of the art facility in Sonoma County, California. Using time tested formulas and modern technology, we control quality and standards from start to finish. Quality & Trust Made from premium ingredients which are selected for their effectiveness and safety and combined with high concentration of botanicals, each ShiKai product is carefully formulated and manufactured—beginning to end—at our facility in Santa Rosa, CA to ensure the highest quality and the best results. Chemistry & Nature Innovation Made with Pride Quality & Trust

Shikakai: “Fruit for the Hair” Shikakai, or Acacia Concinna, is a small shrub-like tree, which grows in the warm, dry plains of central India. For centuries the people who have had access to this tree have used its pod-like fruit to clean their hair. At ShiKai, we import this shikakai powder from India and use it as the primary cleansing and sudsing agent in our products. Instead of using it in its raw powdered state however, we make an extract, which preserves the beneficial properties and converts shikakai powder into a water-soluble form. This “ShiKai” extract, as we’ve named it, is used in place of soaps and harsh detergents. Natural!

Borage Therapy Dry Skin Lotion Color Reflect Gold Shampoo Natural Moisturizing Hand & Body Lotion Coconut Moisturizing Shower Gel Shikai Products Hand Soap Natural Volumizing Shampoo Benefits Soothes and moisturizes problem dry & irritated skin. Naturally enhances color depth, highlights & shine in both natural & color treated hair. Rich & luxourious moisuizer softens skin. Gentle cleanser gives natural shine and body. Strong enough for extra tough jobs but won’t dry skin. Each ShiKai shampoo is based on this special botanical extract which provides rich, dense, gentle lather and leaves hair shiny and manageable. Key Ingredients Borage Oil Natural botanical extracts, a blend of sunscreens & UV filters Aloe, Borage Oil and Shea Butter Aloe & Oatmeal Cocamidopropy Betaine, Vitamin E, Purified Aqua Aloe, Shikakai Extract, Cucumber Extract

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars PRODUCT: GREAT! CAP: NOT SO MUCH…
reviews.reviewText: This conditioner has been my ‘go to’ for many years, after having tried others that were a bit too ‘greasy’ for my needs.The seller did a good job of getting the product shipped within 24hours, and got it to me from east to west coast slightly earlier than forecast, which I appreciated greatly.My only disappointment has been the rocker lid in the bottle’s cap. It dislodged completely when I first pressed down on it and will not ‘snap’ back into place as with most such engineered caps. The bottle is plastic (ugh!) but was well padded in shipping and although there was no discernible damage to the cap itself when opened, it nonetheless is unusable in the normal design sense which may make dispensing difficult and product protection somewhat nullified.Again, great product…good seller…poorly designed and ‘functioning’ cap. Let’s hope that my experience is a ‘one off’.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Silky and smoothe
reviews.reviewText: My wife likes this product. Her hair feels like silk and smells like conditioner. Yep how nice! Though her hair is soft it's surprisingly strong as she likes her hair pulled back( however you want to take this comment) Her hair dresser also likes her hair and has noticed an improvement in her hair health but doesnt notice an improved strength as she doesnt pull it. Her hair seemed kind of thin before but this product was good or something. Yes! Recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best daily conditioner!
reviews.reviewText: Shikai is the best!!! I am a huge fan!! No allergies to any of their products which was a problem with other lines. My hair loves them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2019
reviews.reviewText: This is a great conditioner and they sell it in bulk. Not much more to say about it, my hair was silky smooth after using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very economical and does it's job well!
reviews.reviewText: I like it's light fragrance, and that it doesn't take much to condition my hair, which is dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product line - works well with the shampoo.
reviews.reviewText: Nice light scent; conditions just fine. Its a good product line to have in your shower - the shampoo is great (a LITTLE goes a long long way). Requires using a usual amount of conditioner as verses very little for the shampoo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Natural Product for Every Day
reviews.reviewText: Have used this conditioned and Shikai shampoo and other products for years. Very pure and natural.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Buy it now. Trust me this is so worthy to buy. Just in one wash my husband can”t stop appreciating my hair as only one use of it my hair are super shiny bouncy and frizz free. I’m so happy with my purchase
